executable.title: Deformable BSpline registration
executable.description: Registers two images together using a mutual information metric and BSpline transform
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149.

integer.name: gridSize
integer.description: Number of grid points on interior of image.
integer.label: Grid Size

integer.name: HistogramBins
integer.description: Number of histogram bins to use for Mattes Mutual Information
integer.label: Histogram Bins

integer.name: SpatialSamples
integer.description: Number of spatial samples to use in estimating Mattes Mutual Information
integer.label: Spatial Samples

boolean.name: ConstrainDeformation
boolean.description: Constrain the deformation to the amount specified in Maximum Deformation
boolean.label: Constrain Deformation

float.name: MaximumDeformation
float.description: If Constrain Deformation is checked, limit the deformation to this amount.
float.label: Maximum Deformation

integer.name: DefaultPixelValue
integer.description: Default pixel value if resampled pixel is outside of volume.
integer.label: Default Pixel Value

transform.name: InitialTransform
transform.description: Initial transform for aligning the fixed and moving image. This transform should be an affine or rigid transform. It is used an a bulk transform for the BSpline.
transform.label: Initial transform

transform.name: OutputTransform
transform.description: Transform calculated that aligns the fixed and moving image.
transform.label: Output transform

image.name: FixedImageFileName
image.label: Fixed Image
image.description: Fixed image to which to register
